content:
Rooshaarahithar pokatte-sanaathanmaare!
Devaagaare vannaalum-sabha chollunnevam
/tjeevanapeedhe-appam jeevakaram
/tkaasaa thannil svavilaavil ninnum
Cherttha vimochanarakthavuma-ngarppichidumpoll
Pattanaveethhiyilangingaay-nattamthirivorkku
/thaaleluyyaa -athyantam kashdam.

Othunnaathmaavenperkkaay-baliyarppippin
Kartthaavin gaathram maathram-sharaname nithyam
/tneduveerppum ka-nneerum thirumeyu pol
/taalambameni-kkekunnillethum.
Vishvaadheeshan mashihaa than-thirusannidhiyingkal
sveekaranam samsiddhippaan-aachaaryanmaare
/thaaleluyyaa-praarththhippin ningall.

Khedam vendaa mashihaayil mrthi pundore!
Aasannam prathiphalamekum punaru-ththhaanadinam.
Kedenye kabarukalleennum-ningallezhunne-
Ttathivegam raajaathmajane ethirelppaanetthum.
/tmahimaavin-neeraallam chaartthi
/tthirumumpil-sthuthipaadum ningall
Kanivaalaadaam suthajeevapradane-krpa cheyka.

Aarkkaayu kaazhchakallivideyanayu
Kkunno bhaagyamavannettam
Mel svargatthilavannormmayathundaakum.
Gothrapperukallormmaykkaayu kartthaavin mumpil
Kaanmaan kallukallil mooshaa kotthiyathorkkumpoll
/tningall than mrtharperukalle
/torkkaanum, palllliyilivide
Ezhuthaanum, melsvargatthil
Mashihaathan varavil thanno-
Davar modippaanum cherppin pristhaayil.
